page.title: 07Mentmore Village Green
page.content: The Green, fronted by the aforementioned houses, which have extensive views towards Wing, has mature trees. Beyond are 3 blocks of estate cottages, with a block of older cottages, one the former Post Office and blacksmith's forge. The 'phone box and post box now stand opposite, on the Green, near nos.16 and 14 The Green which were built with stone left over from the mansion, and they have stone stairs. Nearby is the former school house and the school, now a{ {pottery studio.}Before the lane rejoins the main road are 2 modern houses, with an agricultural cottage out of sight below the ridge. On the Leighton Road are 3 very modern and out-of-character executive-type houses, followed by the Stud Farm House and 2 dwellings in the stable buildings with Dutch barns behind.
